title: Are tech savvy people less likely to be racist? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s plenty of tech-savvy racists. I’ve seen many that are also anti-Semitic and conspiratorial. When I first started going on social media years ago I was shocked by the combination of leftism, racism, and porn culture that I encountered. It seemed that the internet was a safe haven for the socially stunted who live in their parents’ basements, then it spread to the larger culture. Then there’s the Social Justice Warrior types (SJW) who tend to accuse anyone who disagrees with them of racism, sexism, and every phobia known to mankind. Finally the two came to a head with the Gamergate controversy. A pox on both their houses. For further reading see: Gamergate controversy Is Nerd Culture A Haven For Racist & Sexist Attitudes? • Hall of The Black Dragon
